artist: Raymond Duchamp-Villon; Founder: Alex Rudier Fondeur
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel Maslon
inscription: Rudier/Fondeur, Paris, incised, on back of neck
signed: Duchamp-Villon, incised, PR side of neck
text:
This work is one of several studies completed by the artist as part of an intended monument to the famed French poet and art critic Charles Baudelaire (1821-1867).

Raymond Duchamp-Villon was the brother of the artists Jacques Villon (1875-1963) and Marcel Duchamp (1887-1968).
title: Head of Baudelaire
